summary:
This here mod adds a special ring to the game. When worn it will shroud you in shadows and makes it easier to blend in the darkness when crouching. 

V2 BETA Solves some wierd glitches as far as I know.
descriptionHtml:
This here mod adds a special ring to the game. When worn it will shroud you in shadows and makes your character and anything you are wearing  and holding darker and makes it easier to blend in the darkness when crouching. It just a neat little effect. It also fortifies your you sneak by base 25%.  

************RRRREEEEEEEAAAAAAAADDDDD TTHIIIISS !!!!!!! *********

IF YOU TRIED OUT MY OTHER SHADOW RING MODS AND ARE TRYING THE BETA V2 IT IS IMPORTANT... well not too important but i think this might interest you... USE CONSOLE COMMANDS TO RESURRECT YOUR CHARACTER ( just to reset your character) . ALL LINGERING EFFECTS FROM MY PREVIOUS MODS WILL GO AWAY. :D

Ring V2 BETA 
- Its enchantment will shroud you in shadows and make you, your armor, ad your equipt items darker when you crouch. Thus making it easier to blend in the shadows.

- I added an new effect ( Tell me what you think please in the comments) and it will give you a subtle lingering black smoke that is apparent all the time when when you are standing up...should I leave it? Should I get rid of it ?? 

- I added my rendition of an Ebony mail effect. Enemies  that are close to you will get poison damage. 

- This ring can be taken to an enchanting table and it effects can be learned and applied to all sorts of stuffs.
author: Striarii

files.name: Striarii Ring V2 beta_ Ebony Mail Learnable Enchantment
files.fileName: Striarii Ring V2 beta_ Ebony Mail Learnable Enchantment-6761.zip
